message: i have noticed it hasn't been quite as snappy.. I am guessing @ericflo and @leah are probably working on making it more webscale
It seems to go through bouts of being pretty sluggish and bouts of speed. I'm betting it's demand based right now, until the back-end infrastructure is made to scale properly.
@Aranjedeath it would be interesting to know the growth rate as I don't see much uptake so far.

@craigshipp Yeah, I wouldn't have any idea. I meant... in the way not-well-setup local cable internet circuits get slow in the evenings due to lack of bandwidth at the carrier. If you get rushes of people, the site gets slow (based on time of day).
